request_pgn.description: Request a particular device to send a PGN

command_address.description: Request a particular device to change its network address

dc_detailed_status.data: pack('C', $sid) . pack('C', $instance) . pack('C', $type). pack('C', $state_of_charge) . pack('C', $state_of_health) .  pack('S', $time_remaining) . pack('S', $ripple_voltage * 100.0)

inverter_status.description: Inverter status. Operating state and inverter are bitfields: 0=off, 1=on

engine_dynamic.data: pack('C', $instance) . pack('V', -1) . pack('S', (273.15 + $temperature) * 100.0) . pack('S', $voltage_alt) .  pack('s', $fuel_rate) . pack('V', $hours) . str_repeat(pack('C', 255), 11)
